name: api-data-science-v2
description: API REST para scraping de WhatsApp con Puppeteer

scripts.dev:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=local  SKIP_STRAPI_CHECK=true nodemon --exec ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.dev:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development USE_STRAPI=false nodemon --exec ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.dev:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production STRAPI_URL=https://tib-core-develop.onrender.com  STRAPI_API_TOKEN=a7fbe2c4f285bf453e24e7f6872b2c259200bfa4e9692fd2207077456ff04654ea6246c4ba568b0611b0a99a1164f3e5c8a7584ca68681d3e28e7b775d041f43578bb69bf19d527838b7f3837200c0b63ba69be0823fb48836249dbd89f86c934afed94d46be9a02653dbc223b0dda72f09c679a43d699680f3416144f5b1857 USE_STRAPI=true nodemon --exec ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production STRAPI_URL=https://tib-core.onrender.com USE_STRAPI=true node build/index.js
